item.title: Ho’onani Hou: A Community-Driven Map-Based Web Platform
item.description: Introducing Ho’onani Hou: a map-based platform for collaborative, community-funded projects.

item.title: AI Pixel Generation: ComfyUI, Flux, SD
item.description: A beginner’s guide to AI image generation with ComfyUI, Stable Diffusion, LoRA, and Flux.

item.title: Building a Polaroid-Style Instagram Card for My Portfolio
item.description: Step-by-step guide: Meta API setup, long-lived tokens, GitHub Actions, Node.js fetcher, and a dark swipeable polaroid UI for Instagram posts.
